attributes.action: ban all bonuses to employees of banks receiving tax payers support.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The payment of bonuses with tax payers money to bankers responsible for massive losses is obscene.  If they are not willing to accept a renegotiation of their emplyment contracts, which would no longer exist if banks had not received government bailouts, they can resign and join the job market.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
